title: Editing a Payment Method from My Account

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch the MPV Mytickets link
2. Give valid email and password and Login
3. Click on Go to Inventory button in confirmation page.
4. Click on "Hamburger Menu-> Payment Info"
5. Click on "Add New Payment Method" button
6. 1. Enter the  card number
2. Enter the Card Expiration date to Future
2. Enter the Card Nickname
3. Enter the First Name, Last Name
4. Select "Set as Default"
5. Enter the Billing information (Street Address, City, Country, State and Postal Code)
6. Click on "Add New Card"

7. Click on "Logout" from Hamburger Menu
8. Repeat Step 1 to Step 4
9. Click on "Edit" icon on the card which is selected in Step 18
10. 1. Change the expiration date to Future
2. Change the Card Nickname
3. Change the First Name, Last Name
4. Select "Set as Default"
5. Change the Billing information (Street Address, City, State and Postal Code)
6. Click on "Update Card"

11. Go to Menu and click on logout
12. Click on "Hamburger Menu-> Payment Info"
13. Click on "Edit" icon on the card which is selected in Step 23
14. Verify all the details updated in Step 10 are reflected
15. Click on "Remove Card" button
16. Go to Menu and click on logout
17. Click on "Hamburger Menu-> Payment Info"
18. Verify that removed card is no longer visible
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV Mytickets link should be launched succesfully and user should be navigated to Login page
2. The user should be landed on My Tickets dashboard where we see the View Tickets & event details of nearest future and View inventory button

3. The user should be navigated to MPV Mytixx home page
4. The Payment info page is displayed
5. The "Add New Payment Method" modal should be displayed
6. The New Card should be added as expected
7. Application should be logged out as expected
8. The Payment page should be displayed
9. The Edit Payment Method should be displayed
10. The details should be updated as expected and a message "The card has been updated" should be displayed
---Persist Digital Wallet API---
11. The user should be able to Log out and navigated to MPV Login page.
12. The Payment info page is displayed
13. The Edit Payment Method should be displayed
14. All the card details from step 10 should be displayed as expected
15. The Card should be removed as expected
16. The user should be able to Log out and navigated to MPV Login page.
17. The Payment info page is displayed
18. The removed call should no longer be visible

) from accordion/minicart opened.

-  Card Number,Type,Address Details, Name on card etc

29. Go to Menu and click on logout

3. The error message should be displayed for the field - Invalid Password
4. The page should be displayed the error message - Please complete all required field message at the top of the page and field validation message - Enter confirm password at the below of the confirm password field.
5. The page should be displayed the error message - Please complete all required field message at the top of the page and field validation message - Password does not match at the below of the password & confirm password field.

7. Now the patron will be navigated to the welcome page & with the message displayed our name - email ID that we gave in signup form

Note - Sections will be displayed with Section codes,Row info and price information if Default sales type in AFP Sales Permission set to 'Best Available' and seat map only if Default sales type in AFP Sales Permission set to 'Map sales' in PV.

21. All the Card details should be served as input
22. The "Save to future use" checkbox should be checked & Save changes
23. -CVC should be given
- The transaction should be completed succesfully.

24. The user should be navigated to MPV Mytixx home page
25. The Dashboard elements - View Tickets,View Inventory should be displayed as expected.

27. Click on View Tickets inventory

title: Verify Seat Relocation flow with paying full amount with credit card where the PEL context rules are Same or greater quantity & Any value
custom_preconds:
1.Set package.seat.relocation.features.enabled to true 
2. Create an Inventoried Package List with type must be â€˜fixedâ€™ and Seat Relocation quantity defined as "Same or greater" and value as "Any". Define valid Synopsis. Do not define quantity in PEL access
3. Constituent events should have alternate date display classes

4. Associate the package line to the package with type package.Set package context is set as "Same quantity". Define valid Synopsis.
5.Set Break Quantity Rule to false

Permissions Required in PEL and Package for seat relocation:

- Package List Access Page - Package List Seat Relocation should be "Allow"
- Package Access page-Package Seat Relocation & View Patron Package Inventory Externally  permission set to "Allow" for mpv user
-Market Permissions
Allow the below Market permissions for MPV Subagency & Patron Market Permissions
a. Relocation Permission
b.Relocate Accessibility Seating Permission
c.Relocate Comp Ticket Permission
d.Relocate Unpaid Orders Permission
e.Relocate Ticket More Than Once
f.Override Buyer Type Restriction
